com.sun.tools.visualvm.host

Class HostsSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.tools.visualvm.host.HostsSupport

  • public final class HostsSupport
extends Object
    Support for hosts in VisualVM.
    Author:
    Jiri Sedlacek

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Host createHost(String hostname)
      Creates new host from provided hostname.
      Host createHost(String hostname, String displayname)
      Creates new host from provided hostname and display name.
      Host getHostByAddress(InetAddress inetAddress)
      Returns already known Host instance with the same InetAddress or null.
      static HostsSupport getInstance()
      Returns singleton instance of HostsSupport.
      Host getOrCreateHost(String hostname, boolean interactive)
      Returns an existing Host instance or creates a new Host if needed.
      static File getStorageDirectory()
      Returns storage directory for defined hosts.
      static boolean storageDirectoryExists()
      Returns true if the storage directory for defined hosts already exists, false otherwise.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static HostsSupport getInstance()
        Returns singleton instance of HostsSupport.
        Returns:
        singleton instance of HostsSupport.

      • createHost

        public Host createHost(String hostname)
        Creates new host from provided hostname. Displays a popup dialog if wrong hostname is provided or the host has already been defined.
        Parameters:
        hostname - hostname of the host to be created.
        Returns:
        new host from provided hostname or null if the hostname could not be resolved.

      • createHost

        public Host createHost(String hostname,
              String displayname)
        Creates new host from provided hostname and display name. Displays a popup dialog if wrong hostname is provided or the host has already been defined.
        Parameters:
        hostname - hostname of the host to be created.
        displayname - displayname of the host to be created.
        Returns:
        new host from provided hostname or null if the hostname could not be resolved.

      • getOrCreateHost

        public Host getOrCreateHost(String hostname,
                   boolean interactive)
        Returns an existing Host instance or creates a new Host if needed.
        Parameters:
        hostname - hostname of the host to be created
        interactive - true if any failure should be visually presented to the user, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        an existing or a newly created Host
        Since:
        VisualVM 1.1.1

      • getHostByAddress

        public Host getHostByAddress(InetAddress inetAddress)
        Returns already known Host instance with the same InetAddress or null.
        Parameters:
        inetAddress - InetAddess to search.
        Returns:
        already known Host instance with the same InetAddress or null.

      • getStorageDirectory

        public static File getStorageDirectory()
        Returns storage directory for defined hosts.
        Returns:
        storage directory for defined hosts.

      • storageDirectoryExists

        public static boolean storageDirectoryExists()
        Returns true if the storage directory for defined hosts already exists, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if the storage directory for defined hosts already exists, false otherwise.
